statements: DELETE FROM ar_marketing_metrics WHERE clicks > 100 AND conversions < 5;
DELETE FROM AR_Marketing_Experiences WHERE id = 1 AND performance_metric > 0.8;
DELETE FROM AR_Marketing_Results WHERE completion_rate < 0.5 AND experience_id IN (SELECT id FROM AR_Marketing_Experiences WHERE engagement_metric < 100);
DELETE FROM engagement_metrics WHERE clicks > 100 AND shares < 50;
DELETE FROM performance_metrics WHERE conversion_rate < 0.5 AND revenue > 1000;
DELETE FROM user_metrics WHERE conversions > 10 AND engagement_score > 8.0;
DELETE FROM AR_Marketing_Experiences WHERE platform = 'Instagram' AND engagement_metric > 100.0;
DELETE FROM Campaigns WHERE budget < 5000.00 AND end_date < '2022-01-01';
